Question: In the entire Apollo 11 photographic record, there are only five images of this person partly shown or reflected.
Hints: This person and Butchart brought the aircraft into a nose-down alignment to increase speed, then launched the Skyrocket.
This person and the group spent the rest of the night drinking scotch and discussing what had happened.
During the Apollo 11 launch, this person's heart reached a top rate of 110 beats per minute.
